General.Name: Scales Corporation Limited
General.Description: Scales Corporation Limited engages in the agribusiness activities in New Zealand, Asia, Europe, North America, and internationally. It operates through Global Proteins, Horticulture, and Logistics segments. The company offers pet food ingredients, edible meat, and offal products under the Meateor NZ, Meateor International, Shelby, Fayman, and Meateor Australia brands; and orchards, apples, fruit packing, juice concentrate products under the Mr Apple, Fern Ridge, and Profruit brands. In addition, it provides logistic services including ocean freight services to exporter and importer of perishable products; and air freight services and warehousing facilities. The company also provides insurance services. Scales Corporation Limited was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Christchurch, New Zealand.
